-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | ContentHashable instances for S3 objects
--   
--   Provides ContentHashable instances for S3 objects
@package cas-hashable-s3
@version 1.0.0


-- | Hashing of S3 objects
--   
--   This module allows us to fetch objects from S3, taking advantage of
--   S3's support for CAS to avoid the need to calculate our own content
--   hashes.
module Data.CAS.ContentHashable.S3

-- | Reference to an object in an S3 bucket
--   
--   Objects can be referenced in a few ways, so this type is parametrised
--   over the object reference. Currently, this is expected to be: -
--   S3.Object (alias for Text) - S3.ObjectInfo
data ObjectInBucket obj
ObjectInBucket :: Bucket -> obj -> ObjectInBucket obj
[_oibBucket] :: ObjectInBucket obj -> Bucket
[_oibObject] :: ObjectInBucket obj -> obj

-- | A lens to _oibBucket
oibBucket :: Functor f => (Bucket -> f Bucket) -> ObjectInBucket obj -> f (ObjectInBucket obj)

-- | A lens to _oibObject
oibObject :: Functor f => (a -> f b) -> ObjectInBucket a -> f (ObjectInBucket b)
class ObjectReference a
objectReference :: ObjectReference a => a -> Object
instance GHC.Generics.Generic (Data.CAS.ContentHashable.S3.ObjectInBucket obj)
instance GHC.Show.Show obj => GHC.Show.Show (Data.CAS.ContentHashable.S3.ObjectInBucket obj)
instance Data.CAS.ContentHashable.S3.ObjectReference Aws.S3.Core.Object
instance Data.CAS.ContentHashable.S3.ObjectReference Aws.S3.Core.ObjectInfo
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON (Data.CAS.ContentHashable.S3.ObjectInBucket Aws.S3.Core.Object)
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON (Data.CAS.ContentHashable.S3.ObjectInBucket Aws.S3.Core.Object)
instance Data.Reflection.Given Aws.Aws.Configuration => Data.CAS.ContentHashable.ContentHashable GHC.Types.IO (Data.CAS.ContentHashable.S3.ObjectInBucket Aws.S3.Core.Object)
instance Data.Reflection.Given Aws.Aws.Configuration Data.Constraint.:=> Data.CAS.ContentHashable.ContentHashable GHC.Types.IO (Data.CAS.ContentHashable.S3.ObjectInBucket Aws.S3.Core.Object)
instance GHC.Base.Monad m => Data.CAS.ContentHashable.ContentHashable m (Data.CAS.ContentHashable.S3.ObjectInBucket Aws.S3.Core.ObjectInfo)
instance Data.Reflection.Given Aws.Aws.Configuration Data.Constraint.:=> Data.CAS.ContentHashable.ContentHashable GHC.Types.IO (Data.CAS.ContentHashable.S3.ObjectInBucket Aws.S3.Core.ObjectInfo)
